name: Primrose
description:
Take your time, set your own pace, establish your own goals, and adapt your play style to whatever you feel is more fun. Primrose rules are easy: there are no time limits, no levels or arbitrary objectives and no constrains.

You must place pairs of tiles on a game grid and attempt to corral groups of tiles with pieces of a different color. When that happens, surrounded tiles disappear and surrounding tiles change colors, allowing chain effects to trigger combos for massive points. You can play for long matches, surviving against the increasing difficulty, or just go all out on a huge single move combo for millions of points.

Relax, enjoy and welcome to Primrose.
